<h1 align="center">
  A simple Image Carousel made with Gatsby, Emotion, React Sping and Contentful CMS
</h1>

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1. Clone the repo to your machine and change into its directory.

```shell
https://github.com/tmrp/simple-gatsby-react-spring-contentful-image-carousel && cd simple-gatsby-react-spring-contentful-image-carousel
```

2. Install dependencies.

```shell
yarn
```

3. Add your own Contentful environment values

4. Start the dev server.

```shell
gatsby develop
```
